short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight sentences with a custom word count threshold on any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight Long Sentences is a user-friendly Chrome extension that effortlessly identifies and highlights sentences with a custom word count threshold on any webpage. Enhance the reading experience on your webpages by quickly spotting long sentences. So you can create easy to understand content. Simply input your desired word count threshold, and the extension will automatically highlight sentences with equal or greater word count, helping you navigate and comprehend text more efficiently. The default setting is 14 words.
